name: Possessed Type
description: The type of the possessed character (Kami, Fomori, etc).

name: Date of Possession
description: The date the character was possessed.

name: Bane Type
description: The type of Bane spirit the Fomori is possessed by.

name: Gaian Spirit
description: The name of the spirit the Kami is possessed by.

name: Spirit Name
description: The name of the spirit the character is possessed by.
